title: Slow cooker tomatillo and pork stew
ingredients: ['2 tablespoons vegetable oil', '900kg boneless pork shoulder', '1 large onion, coarsely chopped', '3 cloves garlic, chopped', '2 tins tomatillos, drained and chopped', '200g green chilli peppers from a jar, diced', '2 fresh jalapeno peppers, sliced', '25g fresh chopped coriander', '1 teaspoon dried oregano', 'salt and pepper to taste', '1L water', '120g grated cheese', '4 tablespoons soured cream', '4 sprigs fresh coriander, for garnish']
